title: [SETUP-BUG] Node modules installation failed
body:
Thank you for submitting an issue. Please refer to our [issue policy](https://www.github.com/mlflow/mlflow/blob/master/ISSUE_POLICY.md) for information on what types of issues we address.

**Please fill in this installation issue template to ensure a timely and thorough response.**

### System information
- **OS Platform and Distribution (e.g., Linux Ubuntu 16.04)**: macOS Monterey (MBA M1)
- **MLflow installed from (source or binary)**:  source
- **MLflow version (run ``mlflow --version``)**:  1.21.0
- **Python version**: 3.8 (but also tried with 3.6)
- **Exact command to reproduce**: `npm install`
- **NPM version**: `npm 8.1.3`

### Describe the problem
I've been trying to follow the instructions provided in [Section 11](https://github.com/mlflow/mlflow/blob/a35ee7a5a3167ce05d6e9faf9169bbd4d819b750/CONTRIBUTING.rst#id11) with no success.  There are some incompatibilities with python packages (because of the M1) but I managed to get them working. The Javascript and UI on the other hand, no matter what I've tried doesn't seem to work. Running the `npm install` results in the errors in attachment.

### Other info / logs
Include any logs or source code that would be helpful to diagnose the problem. If including tracebacks, please include the full traceback. Large logs and files should be attached
[2021-11-16T12_59_45_764Z-debug.log](https://github.com/mlflow/mlflow/files/7546444/2021-11-16T12_59_45_764Z-debug.log)
